bill.title: Department of Public Safety; Judiciary; Service of Process
bill.description: Specifies the persons authorized to serve civil legal process. Mandates the Director of Public Safety to maintain a list of independent civil process servers. Shields the State and the Department of Public Safety from liability arising from the acts of independent civil process servers. Establishes a working group to consider various aspects how process servers should be dealt with in the State. (HB951 CD1)
